description: Example protected keywords configuration - Copy to protected_keywords.json and customize

notes.usage: Any conversation matching ANY keyword in any category is protected from archiving
notes.editing: Add new keywords to appropriate category, or create new categories as needed
notes.regex: Regex patterns require escaping backslashes (\d for digits, \$ for dollar sign)
notes.case_sensitivity: Set to false - matches 'john doe', 'JOHN DOE', 'John Doe'
notes.partial_matching: Set to true - 'Acme Corporation Inc' matches 'Acme Corporation'
notes.categories: Category names are user-defined and can be customized for any use case
notes.filename_matching: Keywords also match conversation IDs (filenames), with underscores converted to spaces
examples: Message 'Invoice INV01923-456 attached' matches INV\d{4,} pattern
Conversation with 'Call CEO Martinez' matches 'CEO Martinez' keyword
